meanings.definition: The act of entering or going in.
meanings.sent1: His ingression into the room was swift and silent.
meanings.sent2: The ingression of the sunlight through the window brightened the whole space.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ingression into the box was met with curiosity from the other pets.
meanings.sent4: Her ingression into the conversation brought a new perspective to the group.
meanings.sent5: The ingression of the cool breeze was a welcome relief on a hot day.

meanings.definition: The process of becoming involved in something.
meanings.sent1: Her ingression into the project was met with enthusiasm by the team.
meanings.sent2: The ingression of new ideas sparked creativity among the group.
meanings.sent3: His ingression into the debate added a fresh dynamic to the discussion.
meanings.sent4: The ingression of technology into daily life has changed how we interact.
meanings.sent5: The ingression of music into the scene set the mood for the evening.

meanings.definition: The state of being in a particular place or situation.
meanings.sent1: The ingression of calmness washed over her as she sat by the lake.
meanings.sent2: His ingression into the role of leader was seamless and natural.
meanings.sent3: The sudden ingression of laughter broke the tension in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her ingression into the spotlight was met with applause and admiration.
meanings.sent5: The ingression of happiness filled the room with warmth and joy.
